name: Valiant Heroes
description:
This is a small 3D level inspired by Valiant Hearts: The Great War. It was made for my Game Art course exam. 

The Game

Private, the enemy is attacking! Make your way to the artillery position and fire back. Your fellow soldiers are depending on you...

Push obstacles, open doors and interact with objects. Run to the finish while shells are exploding all around you.

Awoken by cannon fire again. It is up to me to push the enemy back. Controls

Only playable with a controller. Use the joystick for movement and the X button to interact.

Credits
  • Art, models & animations are self-made. 
  • Music by Maximiliaan Hendrikx.
  • Sound effects were obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com.
